overview: Dan has more than 20 years of business management and ownership. He is the sole proprietor of Bensur Creative Marketing Group. A well known creative and strategic marketing firm serving the private label industry, working with Ralston Foods, Cott Beverage, Carriage House Companies and Dean Foods. Bensur is frequently utilized as a resource in the private label industry, sharing his insights in trade journals and addressing conventions and industry share groups. He holds undergraduate and graduate degrees from Gannon University in Business. He serves on several local and regional boards.
